content.rendered:
Home

Get in touch

We have created the One Touch platform as a robust, durable, responsive and stable platform. Knowing how important our service is to your business, we are committed to giving the support you need, when and where you need it. Our dedicated team are ready to support you and your business.

For general support queries the best way to get in touch is through the system itself. Log into OneTouch and browse to the support section of the system. Here you can raise tickets, access our knowledge base and find the answers to any questions you might have!

If there’s anything else we can help you with or anything you’d like to discuss with us, please don’t hesitate to make contact. Drop us a line at the email addresses below.

For Sales Enquiries: sales@onetouchhealth.net

For General Enquiries: hello@onetouchhealth.net

*Required fields

By submitting this form, you agree for your data be stored in order for us to respond to your enquiry. You can read our Privacy Policy here.
Marketing materials
By submitting this form, you agree for your data be stored in order for us to respond to your enquiry. You can read our Privacy Policy here.
Marketing materials
Name(Required)
Max. file size: 40 MB.
